LanguageData.EM.LactatingGainDesc: When enabled, drug-induced lactation gives a small bonus. Percentage sets strength (0-20%).
LanguageData.EM.SuckleRestrictionDesc: Restricts which pawns can breastfeed from this lactating pawn (e.g. only colony, or only lovers/family).
LanguageData.EM.MilkProductConsumptionRestriction: Who can use milk / milk products
LanguageData.EM.MilkProductConsumptionRestrictionDesc: Restricts who can eat milk or food made from someone's milk (by producer). Same options as suckle; "Same as suckle" uses the setting above.
LanguageData.EM.FedByColumnTip: For the pawn being fed: choose which lactating pawns are allowed to feed this one. Empty list = any; non-empty = only listed.
LanguageData.EM.ProducerRestrictionsColumn: Who can use my milk / eat my milk or cum products
LanguageData.EM.ProducerRestrictionsColumnTip: Female (lactating): who can use my milk, who can eat my milk products. Male: who can eat my cum products. Different from "Fed by" which is set on the baby.
LanguageData.EM.WhoCanSuckleFromMeDefault: List below is pre-filled with children and partner by default; add or remove as needed.
LanguageData.EM.WhoCanUseMyMilkProducts: Who can eat my milk products
LanguageData.EM.WhoCanUseMyMilkProductsDefault: Default: only me. Add pawns to also allow them to eat my milk or food made from my milk.
LanguageData.EM.WhoCanUseMyCumProducts: Who can eat my cum products
LanguageData.EM.WhoCanUseMyCumProductsDefault: Default: only me. Add pawns to also allow them to eat my cum or cum-based products.
LanguageData.EM.ProducerRestrictionsHint: Female: who can use my milk, who can eat my milk products. Male: who can eat my cum products. Set per producer in the Milk table — click "Specify" (…) on the row.
LanguageData.EM.HealthTabRestrictionsButton: Who can use my milk / milk or cum products
LanguageData.EM.DrugRoleHint: To enter lactation: Prolactin or Lucilactin. To boost milk output when already lactating: Galactogogues.
LanguageData.EM.RjwBreastSizeDesc: When lactating, temporarily increase RJW breast size.
LanguageData.EM.RjwLustFromNursingDesc: After nursing, mother and baby gain sex need satisfaction.
LanguageData.EM.RjwSexNeedLactatingBonus: Lactating boosts sex need over time
LanguageData.EM.RjwSexNeedLactatingBonusDesc: While lactating, small periodic bonus to Need_Sex.
LanguageData.EM.RjwSexSatisfactionAfterNursing: Sex after nursing gives extra satisfaction
LanguageData.EM.RjwSexSatisfactionAfterNursingDesc: Sex shortly after nursing gives additional Need_Sex.
LanguageData.EM.RjwLactationFertilityDesc: Pregnancy chance multiplier when mother is lactating (0-1).
LanguageData.EM.RjwLactatingInSexDescDesc: Lactating pawns may get different RJW sex descriptions.
LanguageData.EM.RjwSexAddsLactationBoostDesc: When enabled, lactating pawns who have sex gain a small milk pool increase (ΔL). Uses tolerance and race multiplier.
LanguageData.EM.UseDubsBadHygieneForMastitis: Use DBH Hygiene need for mastitis risk
LanguageData.EM.UseDubsBadHygieneForMastitisDesc: When enabled, low Hygiene (from Dubs Bad Hygiene) increases mastitis/clog risk. When disabled, room cleanliness is used instead.
LanguageData.EM.AllowMastitisDesc: When disabled, mastitis will not be triggered by full pool, hygiene or injury.
LanguageData.EM.MastitisMtbDaysMultiplierHumanlikeDes: Multiply base mastitis MTB for humanlike pawns. >1 = less frequent mastitis.
LanguageData.EM.MastitisMtbDaysMultiplierAnimalDesc: Multiply base mastitis MTB for non-humanlike (animals). Used when animal mastitis is enabled.
LanguageData.EM.AllowToleranceAffectMilkDesc: When disabled, prolactin tolerance does not reduce lactation flow or duration (E_tol = 1).
LanguageData.EM.OverflowFilthDefName: Filth def name when pool overflows
LanguageData.EM.BaselineMilkDurationReference: Reference: drug-induced baseline {0} days, birth-induced {1} days (pool model).
LanguageData.EM.AiPreferHighFullnessTargetsDesc: When enabled, colonists will prefer to milk pawns with higher pool fullness first (reduces overflow risk).
LanguageData.EM.RaceCanAlwaysLactate: Races that can always lactate (defName, comma-separated)
LanguageData.EM.DefaultFlowMultiplierForHumanlikeDesc: Multiplier for milk flow on humanlike pawns (1 = normal). Use with RJW/Race mods for balance.
LanguageData.EM.DevModeNoPawnSelected: No pawn selected. Select a pawn in-game to see L, pool L/R, E, hygiene risk, overflow.
LanguageData.EM.DevModeNotLactating: {0} is not lactating (no Equal Milking lactation hediff).
LanguageData.EM.LoadDefaultsFromDefDesc: Apply key default values from the EM_Defaults Def (other mods can patch that Def to change defaults). Does not overwrite race lists.
LanguageData.EM.FullPoolLetterText: {0} has been at full milk pool for over a day; consider milking to avoid discomfort or overflow.
LanguageData.EM.AlertLactatingButFluidZero: Lactating but RJW breast fluid multiplier 0; use Dev Mode, RJW: Edit parts.
LanguageData.EM_CumBucket_LinkBed_Desc: Link this cum bucket to a bed. When empty, only the bed owner can use it; when occupied, others get "not their cum bucket". Shared bedroom (multiple beds in room) = everyone can use, output is mixed cum.
LanguageData.EM_CumBucket_UnlinkBed_Desc: Unlink this bucket from the bed; anyone can use it afterwards.
LanguageData.EM_CumBucket_SharedRoom: Shared bedroom (everyone can use, mixed cum)
LanguageData.EM_CumBucket_NotYours: {0} cannot use: not their cum bucket (already occupied).
LanguageData.EM_CumBucket_CannotLinkNotOwner: The cum in the bucket does not belong to the bed owner; cannot link.
LanguageData.EM.Milk_SealCumTip: Whether to seal and prevent natural cum leakage. Only for humanlike pawns with vagina.
LanguageData.EM.Milk_AllowDeflateTip: Whether this pawn may take deflate jobs (to bucket / clean / ground). Off = no auto deflate.
LanguageData.EM.DefaultSetting_CanBeFedTip: When this pawn is a baby/child: allow caregivers to auto breastfeed them. Off = they won't be chosen as nursing targets.
